0101000100100110 0100011011010001 1 -> sum: 1001011111111000, cout: 0
1101000100111000 0101001100111100 0 -> sum: 0010010001110100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
